name: Mission XZ1
overview: Published in Your Computer #7 / English translation added unofficially. Your goal is to destroy all possible aliens before they turn deadly. Hordes of descending aliens are hell-bent on destroying your ship. You will need very quick reactions and a fast trigger finger if you want to survive in this very fast machine code game. In addition to the normal options, you can choose the size of the aliens and whether or not there will be any wreckage around which to navigate.
